akn:section.akn:heading: Report on treatment activities by relevant executive branch agencies

akn:content.akn:p: (a) In general Not later than 15 months after May 27, 2003, the President shall submit to appropriate congressional committees a report on the programs and activities of the relevant executive branch agencies that are directed to the treatment of individuals in foreign countries infected with HIV or living with AIDS.
